title: Koruldi lakes
about: The lakes of Koruldi - located in Upper Svaneti, in Mestia, at 2850 m above sea level. The lakes surround the Caucasus glaciers and peaks. On the panoramic view you will see Shkhara, Tetnuldi, Ushba, Laila and others. The peaks of the lakes leave unforgettable impression on the visitor.
